title: Bloomberg Markets: Singh on Embedded AI as Growth Opportunity
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Singh on Embedded AI as Growth Opportunity
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Mandeep Singh Industry Analyst Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing how Artificial intelligence embedded in corporate software applications, in the form of voice-based digital assistants, recommendation systems, chatbots and image-recognition software, could become a key differentiator for software vendors.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
